mapper.sql: ID, PRODUCT_ID, SERVICE_ID, OPEN_ID, ORDER_CODE, DELIVERY_CODE, NUM, PRICE, ADDR, POST_CODE, RECEIVE_NAME, PHONE, COMMENT, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, PAY_TIME, DELIVERY_TIME, CONFIRM_TIME, COMMENT_TIME, STATUS
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from hw_order
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into hw_order (PRODUCT_ID, SERVICE_ID, OPEN_ID, ORDER_CODE, DELIVERY_CODE, NUM, PRICE, ADDR, POST_CODE, RECEIVE_NAME, PHONE, COMMENT, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, PAY_TIME, DELIVERY_TIME, CONFIRM_TIME, COMMENT_TIME, STATUS) values (#{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{confirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{commentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update hw_order
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PRODUCT_ID = #{record.productId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SERVICE_ID = #{record.serviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OPEN_ID = #{record.openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

DELIVERY_CODE = #{record.deliveryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

RECEIVE_NAME = #{record.receiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PAY_TIME = #{record.payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

CONFIRM_TIME = #{record.confirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMMENT_TIME = #{record.commentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update hw_order
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OPEN_ID = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

DELIVERY_CODE = #{deliveryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
